thread.title: J.J. Watt Is Back Training With The Texans
thread.title_full: J.J. Watt Is Back Training With The Texans

title: J.J. Watt Is Back Training With The Texans
text:
J.J. Watt Is Back Training With The Texans January 7, 2017 5:30 PM Filed Under: Houston Texans , J.J. Watt HOUSTON, TX - JANUARY 09: J.J. Watt #99 of the Houston Texans warms up before playing against the Kansas City Chiefs during the AFC Wild Card Playoff game at NRG Stadium on January 9, 2016 in Houston, Texas. (Photo by Bob Levey/Getty Images) 
Houston (CBS HOUSTON) â€“ The Houston Texans have played without J.J. Watt since week 4 of the NFL season thanks to a second back injury that took the three-time defensive player of the year out of commission. 
Good news for the Texans is that Watt is back on the road to recovery. After taking it much slower than his first back surgery rehab J.J. Watt was back on the field training on Friday before the Texans faced the Oakland Raiders in the Wild Card Playoff game. 
Watt will not return until the 2017 season, being placed on IR before week 4.
